titles.title: Gold Star Parents Annuity Act of 2007

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the payment of a monthly stipend to the surviving parents (known as "Gold Star parents") of members of the Armed Forces who die during a period of war.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 5/24/2007--Introduced. Gold Star Parents Annuity Act of 2007 - Directs the Secretary of Defense to pay a special pension to each person who has received a Gold Star lapel button as a parent of a member of the Armed Forces who died while serving.
